document.full_text: mexico has launched an ad campaign to counter its image as a dangerous country and the negative impact on its vital tourist industry of u.s. travel alerts warning americans of violence south of the border.
document.title: mexico counters violent image with u.s. ad campaign
lines_and_colors: mexico has launched an ad campaign to counter its image as a dangerous country and the negative impact on its vital tourist industry of u.s. travel alerts warning americans of violence south of the border.
